li.a: Ellen Street Campus/World Of Wonder/Early Childhood

div.class: wpb_row vc_row vc_row-fluid mk-fullwidth-true attched-false vc_custom_1584096900753 js-master-row mk-full-content-true

div.p: In order to contain all information regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19) in one location, please visit the COVID-19 Resources page on our website.
div.div: Governor Whitmer cancels face to face learning for the remainder of the school year:
div.p: If you have any questions, you may leave a message at our FAPS CALL CENTER at 810-591-4717 or email covidcallcenter@fentonschools.org
